summary: The diff shows modifications to 14 files (backend main.mo, frontend components, pages, configs) but no evidence of a version control rollback to Version 6. The changes appear to be regular code updates rather than a complete codebase reversion as requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Revert the entire codebase to Version 6 state, discarding all changes made in versions 7 through 11
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows only 14 modified files with no indication of a git revert/reset operation. A complete codebase rollback to Version 6 would require version control evidence (git commits, tags, or history manipulation) and would likely affect more than 14 files. The changes appear to be regular code modifications rather than a rollback operation.
evidence: All modified files show code changes rather than complete file replacements from Version 6

hallucinated_features.description: Regular code modifications and updates to existing files
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states 'Must restore complete Version 6 codebase without any modifications' and 'Must not merge or cherry-pick features from versions 7-11'. However, the diff shows ongoing development work including modified components (AppFooter, AppHeader, WatermarkGuard), updated pages (AssessmentPage, LandingPage), and backend changes to main.mo. These are incremental modifications rather than a clean reversion to Version 6 state.
